description: Complete system overview covering the dual-AI architecture (Robbie/Gatekeeper), GPU mesh distribution system, and core business components including memory management and personality systems
Detailed documentation of the personality isolation system, contextual modes (business/flirty), and dynamic personality switching algorithms including the Gandhi-Genghis intensity control system
Documentation of the comprehensive risk assessment system including weighted scoring across reputational, financial, temporal, and personal dimensions with real-time monitoring cycles
Technical details of the distributed GPU processing system including workload distribution algorithms, node health monitoring, and automatic failover mechanisms
Documentation of the vector-based memory system, context retrieval algorithms, and cross-device synchronization including the comprehensive dossier system
